verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
For God so loved us,
He sent the Savior:
For God so loved us,
and loves me too.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Love so unending!
Iâ€™ll sing His praises,
God loves His children,
loves even me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He sent the Savior,
the blest Redeemer;
He sent the Savior
to set me free.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
He bade me welcome,
O word of mercy;
He bade me welcome,
O voice divine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Glory and honor,
O Love eternal,
To Him be given
while life shall last.
